item.title: Valve Corporation Wedding Cake Toppers
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description:
We love Half-Life. We love Portal. We love Portal 2. Valve Corporation wedding cake toppers were inevitable. Again, high excitability = no process shots. Please forgive my shame. The cube and figures are polymer clay over a tightly packed foil base. My hands are strong now. Like, Rockbiter strong. Mmm, delicious limestone. Anyhoo. I baked… Continue reading Valve Corporation Wedding Cake Toppers

item.title: DIY Wedding Bathroom Emergency Kit
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description:
As I’ve said, I’m a fan of gift-wrapping cardboard boxes for instant fancy baskets. So it was an easy thing to put together a wedding bathroom emergency kit. What went in it: Chewing gum (mint and fruit!) Laundry stain wipes Contact lens solution Adhesive bandages Hand lotion Ibuprofen Effervescent antacid Antiseptic wipes Chewable antacid Other… Continue reading DIY Wedding Bathroom Emergency Kit
